price: 73. Nous en fîmes des chefs qui guidaient (vers la voie droite) par Nos ordres. Nous leur inspirâmes de faire le bien, d’observer la Çalât et de s’acquitter de la Zakât ; ils étaient Nos adorateurs.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فِعۡلَ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yahdūna bi-amrinā wa-awḥaynā ilayhim fiʿ'la al-khayrāti wa-iqāma al-ṣalati waītāa al-zakati wakānū lanā ʿābidīna
